titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Xavier University committees annual reports, and other material
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Tim McCabe

publicationstmt.publisher: Xavier University Archives and Special Collections

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Tim McCabe using the OhioLINK EAD Application in 2013

did.head: Overview of the Collection

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Xavier University Archives and Special Collections

did.unittitle: Xavier University committees annual reports, and other material
did.abstract: Annual reports of various Xavier committees submitted annually to the president of the university.

bioghist.head: History of Xavier University committee annual reports submissions
bioghist.p: Various Xavier University committees have historically been obligated to report annually to the university president as far as their activities for the academic year. In addition to the annual reports themselves, there is much documentation on the selection of committee members for a given academic year. This documentation gives some insight into the selection process for committee participation.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection spans from 1991 to 2010. Materials included in the collection can include annual committee reports, committee lists (whether official or draft copies), correspondence and other communications. Typically each university committee is described in an annual listing of committees and committee members. Annual reports may or may not be found for an established committee for a given academic year. The length and format for annual reports can vary.

arrangement.head: Statement of Arrangement
arrangement.p: Materials are arranged in the same general manner as given to the archives from the transferring office. The general order is by academic year. Each year's materials most often includes two folders: one for the primary documentation for that year, the other for various ancillary materials found with the materials. Committee records are generally tabbed in an alphabetical arrangement by name of each committee.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: Please contact the Xavier University Archives staff.

otherfindaid.head: Other Finding Aid
otherfindaid.p: An additional finding aid for this collection can be found in the Xavier University Archives Office. This aid specifies which annual reports had been filed by individual committees for a given academic year.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Box Number, Folder Number, XUA-11, Xavier University committees annual reports, and other material, Special Collections and Archives, Xavier University Library, Cincinnati, Ohio.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Transferred from the Xavier University President's Office to the archives on June 24, 2013.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: There may be additions to this collection at a later date.

controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.
